00087 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_ContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC)
00088 {
00089   orxU32          u32CRC;
00090   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00091 
00092   /* Checks */
00093   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00094 
00095   /* Inits CRC */
00096   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00097 
00098   /* For the whole string */
00099   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00100   {
00101     /* Computes the CRC */
00102     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00103   }
00104 
00105   /* Done! */
00106   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00107 }
00108 
00115 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_NContinueCRC(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32CRC, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00116 {
00117   orxU32          u32CRC;
00118   orxU32          u32Counter;
00119   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00120 
00121   /* Checks */
00122   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00123 
00124   /* Inits CRC */
00125   u32CRC = _u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL;
00126 
00127   /* For the whole string */
00128   for(pc = _zString, u32Counter = 0; (*pc != orxCHAR_NULL) && (u32Counter < _u32CharNumber); pc++, u32Counter++)
00129   {
00130     /* Computes the CRC */
00131     u32CRC = sau32CRCTable[(u32CRC ^ *pc) & 0xFF] ^ (u32CRC >> 8);
00132   }
00133 
00134   /* Done! */
00135   return(u32CRC ^ 0xFFFFFFFFL);
00136 }

00142 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(const orxSTRING _zString)
00143 {
00144   const orxSTRING zResult;
00145 
00146   /* Non null? */
00147   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00148   {
00149     /* Skips all white spaces */
00150     for(zResult = _zString; (*zResult == ' ') || (*zResult == '\t'); zResult++);
00151 
00152     /* Empty? */
00153     if(*zResult == orxCHAR_NULL)
00154     {
00155       /* Updates result */
00156       zResult = orxSTRING_EMPTY;
00157     }
00158   }
00159   else
00160   {
00161     /* Updates result */
00162     zResult = orxNULL;
00163   }
00164 
00165   /* Done! */
00166   return zResult;
00167 }
00168 
00173 static orxINLINE const orxSTRING        orxString_SkipPath(const orxSTRING _zString)
00174 {
00175   const orxSTRING zResult;
00176 
00177   /* Non null? */
00178   if(_zString != orxNULL)
00179   {
00180     const orxCHAR *pc;
00181 
00182     /* Updates result */
00183     zResult = _zString;
00184 
00185     /* For all characters */
00186     for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
00187     {
00188       /* Is a directory separator? */
00189       if((*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) || (*pc == orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00190       {
00191         orxCHAR cNextChar = *(pc + 1);
00192 
00193         /* Non terminal and not a directory separator? */
00194         if((cNextChar != orxCHAR_NULL) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_LINUX) && (cNextChar != orxCHAR_DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS))
00195         {
00196           /* Updates result */
00197           zResult = pc + 1;
00198         }
00199       }
00200     }
00201   }
00202   else
00203   {
00204     /* Updates result */
00205     zResult = orxNULL;
00206   }
00207 
00208   /* Done! */
00209   return zResult;
00210 }

00216 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetLength(const orxSTRING _zString)
00217 {
00218   /* Checks */
00219   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00220 
00221   /* Done! */
00222   return((orxU32)strlen(_zString));

00229 static orxINLINE orxBOOL                orxString_IsCharacterASCII(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00230 {
00231   return((_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE);
00232 }
00233 
00238 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00239 {
00240   orxU32 u32Result;
00241 
00242   /* 1-byte long? */
00243   if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x80)
00244   {
00245     /* Updates result */
00246     u32Result = 1;
00247   }
00248   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x0800)
00249   {
00250     /* Updates result */
00251     u32Result = 2;
00252   }
00253   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00010000)
00254   {
00255     /* Updates result */
00256     u32Result = 3;
00257   }
00258   else if(_u32CharacterCodePoint < 0x00110000)
00259   {
00260     /* Updates result */
00261     u32Result = 4;
00262   }
00263   else
00264   {
00265     /* Updates result */
00266     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00267   }
00268 
00269   /* Done! */
00270   return u32Result;
00271 }
00272 
00279 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_PrintUTF8Character(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32Size, orxU32 _u32CharacterCodePoint)
00280 {
00281   orxU32 u32Result;
00282 
00283   /* Gets character's encoded length */
00284   u32Result = orxString_GetUTF8CharacterLength(_u32CharacterCodePoint);
00285 
00286   /* Enough room? */
00287   if(u32Result <= _u32Size)
00288   {
00289     /* Depending on character's length */
00290     switch(u32Result)
00291     {
00292       case 1:
00293       {
00294         /* Writes character */
00295         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)_u32CharacterCodePoint;
00296 
00297         break;
00298       }
00299 
00300       case 2:
00301       {
00302         /* Writes first character */
00303         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xC0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x07C0) >> 6));
00304 
00305         /* Writes second character */
00306         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00307 
00308         break;
00309       }
00310 
00311       case 3:
00312       {
00313         /* Writes first character */
00314         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xE0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0xF000) >> 12));
00315 
00316         /* Writes second character */
00317         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0FC0) >> 6));
00318 
00319         /* Writes third character */
00320         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00321 
00322         break;
00323       }
00324 
00325       case 4:
00326       {
00327         /* Writes first character */
00328         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0xF0 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x001C0000) >> 18));
00329 
00330         /* Writes second character */
00331         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x0003F000) >> 12));
00332 
00333         /* Writes third character */
00334         *_zDstString++ = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | ((_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x00000FC0) >> 6));
00335 
00336         /* Writes fourth character */
00337         *_zDstString = (orxCHAR)(0x80 | (_u32CharacterCodePoint & 0x3F));
00338 
00339         break;
00340       }
00341 
00342       default:
00343       {
00344         /* Logs message */
00345         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print invalid unicode character <0x%X> to string.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00346 
00347         /* Updates result */
00348         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00349 
00350         break;
00351       }
00352     }
00353   }
00354   else
00355   {
00356     /* Logs message */
00357     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Can't print unicode character <0x%X> to string as there isn't enough space for it.", _u32CharacterCodePoint);
00358 
00359     /* Updates result */
00360     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00361   }
00362 
00363   /* Done! */
00364   return u32Result;
00365 }
00366 
00372 static orxU32 orxFASTCALL               orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(const orxSTRING _zString, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00373 {
00374   orxU8  *pu8Byte;
00375   orxU32  u32Result;
00376 
00377   /* Checks */
00378   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00379 
00380   /* Gets the first byte */
00381   pu8Byte = (orxU8 *)_zString;
00382 
00383   /* ASCII? */
00384   if(*pu8Byte < 0x80)
00385   {
00386     /* Updates result */
00387     u32Result = *pu8Byte;
00388   }
00389   /* Invalid UTF-8 byte sequence */
00390   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC0)
00391   {
00392     /* Logs message */
00393     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: multi-byte sequence non-leading byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00394 
00395     /* Updates result */
00396     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00397   }
00398   /* Overlong UTF-8 2-byte sequence */
00399   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xC2)
00400   {
00401     /* Logs message */
00402     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: overlong 2-byte sequence starting with byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00403 
00404     /* Updates result */
00405     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00406   }
00407   /* 2-byte sequence */
00408   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xE0)
00409   {
00410     /* Updates result with first character */
00411     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x1F;
00412 
00413     /* Valid second character? */
00414     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00415     {
00416       /* Updates result */
00417       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00418     }
00419     else
00420     {
00421       /* Logs message */
00422       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 2-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00423 
00424       /* Updates result */
00425       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00426     }
00427   }
00428   /* 3-byte sequence */
00429   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF0)
00430   {
00431     /* Updates result with first character */
00432     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x0F;
00433 
00434     /* Valid second character? */
00435     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00436     {
00437       /* Updates result */
00438       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00439 
00440       /* Valid third character? */
00441       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00442       {
00443         /* Updates result */
00444         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00445       }
00446       else
00447       {
00448         /* Logs message */
00449         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00450 
00451         /* Updates result */
00452         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00453       }
00454     }
00455     else
00456     {
00457       /* Logs message */
00458       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 3-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00459 
00460       /* Updates result */
00461       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00462     }
00463   }
00464   /* 4-byte sequence */
00465   else if(*pu8Byte < 0xF5)
00466   {
00467     /* Updates result with first character */
00468     u32Result = *pu8Byte++ & 0x07;
00469 
00470     /* Valid second character? */
00471     if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00472     {
00473       /* Updates result */
00474       u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00475 
00476       /* Valid third character? */
00477       if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00478       {
00479         /* Updates result */
00480         u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte++ & 0x3F);
00481 
00482         /* Valid fourth character? */
00483         if((*pu8Byte & 0xC0) == 0x80)
00484         {
00485           /* Updates result */
00486           u32Result = (u32Result << 6) | (*pu8Byte & 0x3F);
00487         }
00488         else
00489         {
00490           /* Logs message */
00491           orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00492 
00493           /* Updates result */
00494           u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00495         }
00496       }
00497       else
00498       {
00499         /* Logs message */
00500         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00501 
00502         /* Updates result */
00503         u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00504       }
00505     }
00506     else
00507     {
00508       /* Logs message */
00509       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: 4-byte sequence non-trailing byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00510 
00511       /* Updates result */
00512       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00513     }
00514   }
00515   else
00516   {
00517     /* Logs message */
00518     orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF-8 string at <0x%X>: invalid out-of-bound byte '%c' (0x%2X) at index %ld.", _zString, *pu8Byte, *pu8Byte, pu8Byte - (orxU8 *)_zString);
00519 
00520     /* Updates result */
00521     u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00522   }
00523 
00524   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00525   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00526   {
00527     /* Stores it */
00528     *_pzRemaining = (orxSTRING)(pu8Byte + 1);
00529   }
00530 
00531   /* Done! */
00532   return u32Result;
00533 }
00534 
00539 static orxINLINE orxU32                 orxString_GetCharacterCounter(const orxSTRING _zString)
00540 {
00541   const orxCHAR  *pc;
00542   orxU32          u32Result;
00543 
00544   /* Checks */
00545   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00546 
00547   /* For all characters */
00548   for(pc = _zString, u32Result = 0; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; u32Result++)
00549   {
00550     /* Invalid current character ID */
00551     if(orxString_GetFirstCharacterCodePoint(pc, &pc) == orxU32_UNDEFINED)
00552     {
00553       /* Updates result */
00554       u32Result = orxU32_UNDEFINED;
00555 
00556       /* Logs message */
00557       orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM, "Invalid or non-UTF8 string <%s>, can't count characters.", _zString);
00558 
00559       break;
00560     }
00561   }
00562 
00563   /* Done! */
00564   return u32Result;
00565 }

00573 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_NCopy(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00574 {
00575   /* Checks */
00576   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
00577   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
00578 
00579   /* Done! */
00580   return(strncpy(_zDstString, _zSrcString, (size_t)_u32CharNumber));
00581 }

00602 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_Duplicate(const orxSTRING _zSrcString)
00603 {
00604   orxU32    u32Size;
00605   orxSTRING zResult;
00606 
00607   /* Checks */
00608   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
00609 
00610   /* Gets string size in bytes */
00611   u32Size = (orxString_GetLength(_zSrcString) + 1) * sizeof(orxCHAR);
00612 
00613   /* Allocates it */
00614   zResult = (orxSTRING)orxMemory_Allocate(u32Size, orxMEMORY_TYPE_TEXT);
00615 
00616   /* Valid? */
00617   if(zResult != orxNULL)
00618   {
00619     /* Copies source to it */
00620     orxMemory_Copy(zResult, _zSrcString, u32Size);
00621   }
00622 
00623   /* Done! */
00624   return zResult;
00625 }

00630 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_Delete(orxSTRING _zString)
00631 {
00632   /* Checks */
00633   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00634   orxASSERT(_zString != orxSTRING_EMPTY);
00635 
00636   /* Frees its memory */
00637   orxMemory_Free(_zString);
00638 
00639   /* Done! */
00640   return orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00641 }

00683 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_ICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2)
00684 {
00685   /* Checks */
00686   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00687   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00688 
00689 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00690 
00691   /* Done! */
00692   return(stricmp(_zString1, _zString2));
00693 
00694 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00695 
00696   /* Done! */
00697   return strcasecmp(_zString1, _zString2);
00698 
00699 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00700 }

00710 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_NICompare(const orxSTRING _zString1, const orxSTRING _zString2, orxU32 _u32CharNumber)
00711 {
00712   /* Checks */
00713   orxASSERT(_zString1 != orxNULL);
00714   orxASSERT(_zString2 != orxNULL);
00715 
00716 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00717 
00718   /* Done! */
00719   return strnicmp(_zString1, _zString2, (size_t)_u32CharNumber);
00720 
00721 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00722 
00723   /* Done! */
00724   return strncasecmp(_zString1, _zString2, _u32CharNumber);
00725 
00726 #endif /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00727 }

00736 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32Base(const orxSTRING _zString, orxU32 _u32Base, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00737 {
00738   orxCHAR    *pcEnd;
00739   orxSTATUS   eResult;
00740 
00741   /* Checks */
00742   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00743   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00744 
00745   /* Convert */
00746   *_ps32OutValue = strtol(_zString, &pcEnd, (size_t)_u32Base);
00747   
00748   /* Valid conversion ? */
00749   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00750   {
00751     /* Updates result */
00752     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00753   }
00754   else
00755   {
00756     /* Updates result */
00757     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
00758   }
00759 
00760   /* Asks for remaining string? */
00761   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
00762   {
00763     /* Stores it */
00764     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
00765   }
00766 
00767   /* Done! */
00768   return eResult;
00769 }
00770 
00777 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToS32(const orxSTRING _zString, orxS32 *_ps32OutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
00778 {
00779   orxSTATUS eResult;
00780 
00781   /* Checks */
00782   orxASSERT(_ps32OutValue != orxNULL);
00783   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
00784 
00785   /* Hexadecimal? */
00786   if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00787   && (_zString[0] == '0')
00788   && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00789   && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'x'))
00790   {
00791     /* Gets hexa value */
00792     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 16, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00793   }
00794   /* Binary? */
00795   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00796        && (_zString[0] == '0')
00797        && (_zString[1] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00798        && ((_zString[1] | 0x20) == 'b'))
00799   {
00800     /* Gets binary value */
00801     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 2, 2, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00802   }
00803   /* Octal? */
00804   else if((_zString[0] != orxCHAR_EOL)
00805        && ((_zString[0] | 0x20) == '0')
00806        && ((_zString[1]) >= '0')
00807        && ((_zString[1]) <= '9'))
00808   {
00809     /* Gets octal value */
00810     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString + 1, 8, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00811   }
00812   /* Decimal */
00813   else
00814   {
00815     /* Gets decimal value */
00816     eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, _ps32OutValue, _pzRemaining);
00817   }
00818 
00819   /* Done! */
00820   return eResult;
00821 }

00831 {

00837   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);

00841   
00842   /* Valid conversion ? */
00843   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))
00844   {
00845     /* Updates result */
00846     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
00847   }
00848   else
00849   {
00850     /* Updates result */

00852   }

01111 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToFloat(const orxSTRING _zString, orxFLOAT *_pfOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
01112 {

01116   /* Checks */
01117   orxASSERT(_pfOutValue != orxNULL);
01118   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01119 
01120   /* Linux / Mac / iOS / Android / MSVC? */
01121 #if defined(__orxLINUX__) || defined(__orxMAC__) || defined (__orxIOS__) || defined(__orxMSVC__) || defined(__orxANDROID__)
01122 
01123   /* Converts it */
01124   *_pfOutValue = (orxFLOAT)strtod(_zString, &pcEnd);
01125

01127 
01128   /* Converts it */
01129   *_pfOutValue = strtof(_zString, &pcEnd);
01130 
01131 #endif /* __orxLINUX__ || __orxMAC__ || __orxIOS__ || __orxMSVC__ || __orxANDROID__ */
01132 
01133   /* Valid conversion ? */
01134   if((pcEnd != _zString) && (_zString[0] != orxCHAR_NULL))

01136     /* Updates result */
01137     eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01138   }
01139   else
01140   {
01141     /* Updates result */
01142     eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
01143   }
01144 
01145   /* Asks for remaining string? */
01146   if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01147   {
01148     /* Stores it */
01149     *_pzRemaining = pcEnd;
01150   }

01153   return eResult;

01162 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToVector(const orxSTRING _zString, orxVECTOR *_pvOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
01163 {
01164   orxVECTOR       stValue;
01165   const orxSTRING zString;
01166   orxSTATUS       eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
01167 
01168   /* Checks */
01169   orxASSERT(_pvOutValue != orxNULL);
01170   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01171 
01172   /* Skips all white spaces */
01173   zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(_zString);
01174 
01175   /* Is a vector start character? */
01176   if((*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START)
01177   || (*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_START_ALT))
01178   {
01179     /* Skips all white spaces */
01180     zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01181 
01182     /* Gets X value */
01183     eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fX), &zString);
01184 
01185     /* Success? */
01186     if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01187     {
01188       /* Skips all white spaces */
01189       zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01190 
01191       /* Is a vector separator character? */
01192       if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
01193       {
01194         /* Skips all white spaces */
01195         zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01196 
01197         /* Gets Y value */
01198         eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fY), &zString);
01199 
01200         /* Success? */
01201         if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01202         {
01203           /* Skips all white spaces */
01204           zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01205 
01206           /* Is a vector separator character? */
01207           if(*zString == orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_SEPARATOR)
01208           {
01209             /* Skips all white spaces */
01210             zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString + 1);
01211 
01212             /* Gets Z value */
01213             eResult = orxString_ToFloat(zString, &(stValue.fZ), &zString);
01214 
01215             /* Success? */
01216             if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01217             {
01218               /* Skips all white spaces */
01219               zString = orxString_SkipWhiteSpaces(zString);
01220 
01221               /* Is not a vector end character? */
01222               if((*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END)
01223               && (*zString != orxSTRING_KC_VECTOR_END_ALT))
01224               {
01225                 /* Updates result */
01226                 eResult = orxSTATUS_FAILURE;
01227               }
01228             }
01229           }
01230         }
01231       }
01232     }
01233   }
01234 
01235   /* Valid? */
01236   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01237   {
01238     /* Updates vector */
01239     orxVector_Copy(_pvOutValue, &stValue);
01240 
01241     /* Asks for remaining string? */
01242     if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01243     {
01244       /* Stores it */
01245       *_pzRemaining = zString + 1;
01246     }
01247   }
01248 
01249   /* Done! */
01250   return eResult;
01251 }
01252 
01259 static orxINLINE orxSTATUS              orxString_ToBool(const orxSTRING _zString, orxBOOL *_pbOutValue, const orxSTRING *_pzRemaining)
01260 {
01261   orxS32    s32Value;
01262   orxSTATUS eResult;
01263 
01264   /* Checks */
01265   orxASSERT(_pbOutValue != orxNULL);
01266   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01267 
01268   /* Tries numeric value */
01269   eResult = orxString_ToS32Base(_zString, 10, &s32Value, _pzRemaining);
01270 
01271   /* Valid? */
01272   if(eResult != orxSTATUS_FAILURE)
01273   {
01274     /* Updates boolean */
01275     *_pbOutValue = (s32Value != 0) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
01276   }
01277   else
01278   {
01279     orxU32 u32Length;
01280 
01281     /* Gets length of false */
01282     u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_FALSE);
01283 
01284     /* Is false? */
01285     if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_FALSE, u32Length) == 0)
01286     {
01287       /* Updates boolean */
01288       *_pbOutValue = orxFALSE;
01289 
01290       /* Has remaining? */
01291       if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01292       {
01293         /* Updates it */
01294         *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01295       }
01296 
01297       /* Updates result */
01298       eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01299     }
01300     else
01301     {
01302       /* Gets length of true */
01303       u32Length = orxString_GetLength(orxSTRING_TRUE);
01304 
01305       /* Is true? */
01306       if(orxString_NICompare(_zString, orxSTRING_TRUE, u32Length) == 0)
01307       {
01308         /* Updates boolean */
01309         *_pbOutValue = orxTRUE;
01310 
01311         /* Has remaining? */
01312         if(_pzRemaining != orxNULL)
01313         {
01314           /* Updates it */
01315           *_pzRemaining += u32Length;
01316         }
01317 
01318         /* Updates result */
01319         eResult = orxSTATUS_SUCCESS;
01320       }
01321     }
01322   }
01323 
01324   /* Done! */
01325   return eResult;
01326 }

01332 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_LowerCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01333 {
01334   orxCHAR *pc;
01335 
01336   /* Checks */
01337   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01338 
01339   /* Converts the whole string */
01340   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01341   {
01342     /* Needs to be converted? */
01343     if(*pc >= 'A' && *pc <= 'Z')
01344     {
01345       /* Lower case */
01346       *pc |= 0x20;
01347     }
01348   }
01349 
01350   return _zString;
01351 }
01352 
01357 static orxINLINE orxSTRING              orxString_UpperCase(orxSTRING _zString)
01358 {
01359   orxCHAR *pc;
01360 
01361   /* Checks */
01362   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01363 
01364   /* Converts the whole string */
01365   for(pc = _zString; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++)
01366   {
01367     /* Needs to be converted? */
01368     if(*pc >= 'a' && *pc <= 'z')
01369     {
01370       /* Upper case */
01371       *pc &= ~0x20;
01372     }
01373   }
01374 
01375   return _zString;
01376 }

01440 static orxINLINE orxS32                 orxString_SearchCharIndex(const orxSTRING _zString, orxCHAR _cChar, orxU32 _u32Position)
01441 {
01442   orxS32          s32Result = -1;
01443   orxS32          s32Index;
01444   const orxCHAR  *pc;
01445 
01446   /* Checks */
01447   orxASSERT(_zString != orxNULL);
01448   orxASSERT(_u32Position <= orxString_GetLength(_zString));
01449 
01450   /* For all characters */
01451   for(s32Index = _u32Position, pc = _zString + s32Index; *pc != orxCHAR_NULL; pc++, s32Index++)
01452   {
01453     /* Found? */
01454     if(*pc == _cChar)
01455     {
01456       /* Updates result */
01457       s32Result = s32Index;
01458 
01459       break;
01460     }
01461   }
01462 
01463   /* Done! */
01464   return s32Result;
01465 }

01472 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_Print(orxSTRING _zDstString, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01473 {
01474   va_list stArgs;
01475   orxS32  s32Result;
01476 
01477   /* Checks */
01478   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
01479   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
01480 
01481   /* Gets variable arguments & print the string */
01482   va_start(stArgs, _zSrcString);
01483   s32Result = vsprintf(_zDstString, _zSrcString, stArgs);
01484   va_end(stArgs);
01485 
01486   /* Done! */
01487   return s32Result;
01488 }
01489 
01496 static orxINLINE orxS32 orxCDECL        orxString_NPrint(orxSTRING _zDstString, orxU32 _u32CharNumber, const orxSTRING _zSrcString, ...)
01497 {
01498   va_list stArgs;
01499   orxS32  s32Result;
01500 
01501   /* Checks */
01502   orxASSERT(_zDstString != orxNULL);
01503   orxASSERT(_zSrcString != orxNULL);
01504 
01505   /* Gets variable arguments & print the string */
01506   va_start(stArgs, _zSrcString);
01507   s32Result = vsnprintf(_zDstString, (size_t)_u32CharNumber, _zSrcString, stArgs);
01508   va_end(stArgs);
01509 
01510   /* Done! */
01511   return s32Result;
01512 }
